description: Application for a minor material amendment (variation of condition 2 - approved plans) following grant of planning permission ref:PP/2014/3617) for a single storey rear extension and installation of double glazed windows and doors to the rear
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: BR/KJ/05 Rev 0, BR/KJ/06 Rev 0, BR/KJ/07 Rev B, BR/KJ/08 Rev B Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning | The proposed development can be accepted as a minor material amendment to planning permission P/2014/3617 dated 29/08/2014. The proposal would still comply with the policies of the London Plan 2011, the Adopted Core Strategy 2012 and the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013.
